services.name: Electrical Repairs
services.shortDescription: Safe and reliable electrical repair services.
services.longDescription: Our licensed electricians handle all electrical repairs safely and efficiently. From flickering lights to faulty wiring, we troubleshoot and fix issues to ensure your home's safety.

services.name: Lighting Installation
services.longDescription: Transform your space with professional lighting installation. We install recessed lighting, chandeliers, and outdoor fixtures to enhance the beauty and functionality of your home.

services.name: Outlet & Switch Installation
services.longDescription: Add convenience and safety with new outlets and switches. We install GFCIs, USB outlets, and dimmers, upgrading your home's electrical accessibility.

services.name: Ceiling Fan Installation
services.longDescription: Stay cool and comfortable with our ceiling fan installation services. We ensure secure mounting and proper wiring for optimal performance and safety.

services.name: Electrical Inspections
services.longDescription: Ensure your home's electrical system is up to code with our comprehensive inspections. We identify potential hazards and recommend solutions for a safe home.

services.name: Panel Upgrades
services.longDescription: Modernize your home's power system with an electrical panel upgrade. We replace outdated panels to handle increased electrical loads, enhancing safety and performance.

seo.metaDescription: AmazonMan provides professional electrical services in Rancho Santa Margarita, CA. 10+ years experience. Licensed & insured. Call for a free estimate!
seo.metaKeywords: electrical, Rancho Santa Margarita, CA, electrical repairs, lighting installation, outlet & switch installation, ceiling fan installation, electrical inspections, panel upgrades
